comments:
After changes for 193935 "The Authentication Token Manager should be able to fullfil request for tokens bound to VOs"
now it's not possible to create GRIA VO in one step.

Please:
1. In empty workspace go do Window/Preferences - VO Declarations
2. Define Gria VO with 1 remote wsl:
	https://iwr-geclipse.fzk.de:8442/gria-basic-app-services/services/JobService?wsdl

Result: After clicking OK in "Add a service"  exception "Failed to instantiate class" is thrown

I implemented GriaKeyStoreDescription#matches( IAuthenticationTokenDescription ) in order to make the new token request mechanism working for GRIA now. Sorry for forgetting about and thanks for finding this! Please update eu.geclipse.gria and verify that it works again for you.

Now it works correctly :-)
Danke for fast reaction!

It's always a pleasure :)
